list.name: Annotations & Alerts
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
  extract(epoch from time_column) AS time,
  text_column as text,
  tags_column as tags
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

targets.query: ip_address:($ip) AND (message:"Replica version upgrade detected at" OR message:"Replica upgrade")

targets.alias: Delivering finalized batch at CUP height
targets.query: ip_address:($ip) AND message:"Delivering finalized batch at CUP height"
targets.refId: Delivering finalized batch at CUP height

targets.query: ip_address:($ip) AND message:"Starting version upgrade at CUP registry"
ip_address:($ip) AND message:"Starting new replica process"
ip_address:($ip) AND message:"Using path '/var/lib/ic/data/ic_state' to manage local state"
ip_address:($ip) AND message:"Cleaning up diverged states took"
ip_address:($ip) AND LEVEL:($level) SYSLOG_IDENTIFIER:($process_name) AND (NOT MODULE:control_plane) AND (NOT SYSLOG_IDENTIFIER:($process_filter_out))
